data.title: Contact
data.meta_description: CONTACT Where we are and how to reach us We are looking forward to your inquiry! Please fill out our contact form. The respective contact person will get back to you as soon as possible. Address Dortmund Headquarters SMF GmbHPaul-Henri-Spaak-Strasse 544263 DortmundGermany E-mail: info@smf.dePhone: +49 231 9644-0 Opening hoursOur reception is open from Monday to Friday from 8:00 to 16:00. Address branch office DortmundSMF GmbH (TMM Forum)Carlo-Schmid-Allee 13 a Bitte lasse dieses Feld leer. Submit * Mandatory for all inquiries about our offers. There are numerous, free parking spaces available at the building. Approach by public transport Subway stop“Rombergpark”, line U49, approx. 10-15 min walking distanceBus stop“Robert-Schuman-Straße”, line 451, approx. 5 min on foot Details can be obtained from the website www.bus-und-bahn.de or by calling the chargeable service number of the Dortmund public utility DSW 21 on 01803 504030. Locations abroad Proximity to the market and customers is important to us. Therefore, we are not only represented in Germany, but also in Great Britain, Poland, Slovenia and Serbia.
data.text:
Please fill out our contact form. The respective contact person will get back to you as soon as possible.

Proximity to the market and customers is important to us. Therefore, we are not only represented in Germany, but also in Great Britain, Poland, Slovenia and Serbia.
